snippet.title: Full Void - Evercade Gameplay
snippet.description:
Recorded directly off the Evercade VS.

Full Void is a 2D Cinematic Puzzle Platformer set in a dystopian future. A young teenager, scared and alone, must use all their skills to defeat a rogue AI that keeps mankind oppressed.

Full Void (C) OutOfTheBit Ltd.
Also released on Steam, PS4, PS5, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch
Get the soundtrack for free on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2682290/Full_Void_Soundtrack/

#retrogames #retrogaming #evercade #evercadeexp #evercadevs #fullvoid #full_void #indiegames

FUN FACT:
The Evercade release includes a comic book that serves as a prologue to the game's story. Meanwhile, the Special Edition release includes an exclusive blue coloured cartridge, stickers, poster, an exclusive cart inlay and an art book, all in one cardboard sleeve.
